alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 5:16PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Choctaw and Webster Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 516 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Embry, or 8 miles northwest of Eupora, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bellefontaine around 525 PM CDT. Eupora and Walthall around 530 PM CDT. Clarkson around 550 PM CDT. Mathiston around 555 PM CDT. Cumberland around 600 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central, north central and northeastern Mississippi.
